sentence.Network_en: The government's record on employment did not endear them to the voters.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府促进就业的成绩未能为它赢取选民的支持.

sentence.Network_en: He managed to endear himself to my entire family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能让我全家人都喜欢他.

sentence.Network_en: Being in charge of the National Health Service reforms did not endear him to one and all.
sentence.Network_cn: 负责国民医疗服务制度改革并未使得所有人都喜欢他。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... encircle 作成一圈，包围 endear 使受喜爱 ennoble 使成贵族，使高贵.
The Black Cat (1) ... deprive 被剥夺 endear 使受钟爱, aversion 厌恶.
职场新人八大法则(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... disclose 公开，暴露 endear 使亲密，使钟爱 drone 嗡嗡声.
英语词汇逻辑记忆法_旺旺英语教学网 ... dear 亲爱的 endear 使亲近 fear 害怕.

list.abs: it's enthralling and endearing stuff , especially when your team scores and the little blobs representing players all hurtle off to the corner flag to form a bundle …它的迷人和可爱的东西，尤其是当你的球队成绩和球员都代表了赫特尔国旗的一角，形成一个捆绑小斑点…
Timetabling has also helped endear professors to the changes ., 制定时间表也有助于让教授们喜欢上课程改革.
The endearing sweetness of her manners so charmed Bertram ., 她那甜蜜可爱的姿态叫勃特拉姆为之倾倒.
and the life that people endears ., 人们钟情的生活.

entry.def: If something endears you to someone or if you endear yourself to them, you become popular with them and well liked by them.

example.ex: Their taste for gambling has endeared them to Las Vegas casino owners...
example.tran: 他们因好赌而深受拉斯维加斯赌场老板的欢迎。

example.ex: He has endeared himself to the American public.
example.tran: 他已经赢得了美国民众的好感。

auth_sentence.content: This is not a view likely to endear him to traditionalists.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not a view likely to endear him to traditionalists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not a view likely to endear him to traditionalists.

auth_sentence.content: This course of action will not endear you to your leaseholders.
auth_sentence.res_content: This course of action will not endear you to your leaseholders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This course of action will not endear you to your leaseholders.

auth_sentence.content: Unfortunately, that didn't endear them to many of our guests.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unfortunately, that didn't endear them to many of our guests.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unfortunately, that didn't endear them to many of our guests.

sentences.en: Her kindness of heart endeared her to everyone.
sentences.cn: 她心地善良, 人人都喜欢她。

sentences.en: He managed to endear himself to my entire family.
sentences.cn: 他能让我全家人都喜欢他。

sentences.en: The government’s record on employment did not endear them to the voters.
sentences.cn: 政府促进就业的成绩未能为它赢取选民的支持。
